package.name: iiwa_realsense_camera
package.description: ROS 2 is a package for working with the Intel RealSense camera in an environment with the KUKA LBR iiwa collaborative manipulator. Supports receiving and publishing synchronized RGB and depth images, 3D points, and integration with neural network models (YOLO, segmentation, poses). Enables the camera management service, changes to models, profiles, and crop parameters.
